name: R4B-Coverage-R5-Coverage
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Coverage into FHIR R5

element.display: Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement

target.display: Insurance or medical plan or a payment agreement
target.comment: R4B `Coverage` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage`
R4B `Coverage.beneficiary` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.beneficiary`
R4B `Coverage.class` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.class`
R4B `Coverage.class.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.class.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Coverage.class.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.class.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.class.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.class.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Human readable description of the type and value

target.display: Human readable description of the type and value
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.class.name` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.class.name`

element.display: Type of class such as 'group' or 'plan'

target.display: Type of class such as 'group' or 'plan'
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.class.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.class.type`
R4B `Coverage.class.value` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `Coverage.class.value` - value has change due to type change: R4B value string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 value
R4B `Coverage.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.contained`
R4B `Coverage.contract` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.contract`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception`

R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The effective period of the exception

target.display: The effective period of the exception
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.period`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.exception.type`

R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.type`

element.display: The amount or percentage due from the beneficiary

target.display: The amount or percentage due from the beneficiary
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.value[x]` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.costToBeneficiary.value[x]` - value[x] has change due to type change: R4B `value[x]` `Money` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `value[x]`
R4B `Coverage.dependent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.dependent`
R4B `Coverage.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `Coverage.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.id`
R4B `Coverage.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.implicitRules`
R4B `Coverage.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `Coverage.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.meta`

R4B `Coverage.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `Coverage.network` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.network`
R4B `Coverage.order` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.order`
R4B `Coverage.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.period`
R4B `Coverage.policyHolder` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.policyHolder`
R4B `Coverage.relationship` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.relationship`

R4B `Coverage.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/fm-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/fm-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `Coverage.subrogation` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.subrogation`
R4B `Coverage.subscriber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.subscriber`

R4B `Coverage.subscriberId` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Coverage.subscriberId` - subscriberId changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); subscriberId has change due to type change: R4B subscriberId string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 subscriberId

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.text`

element.display: Coverage category such as medical or accident

target.display: Coverage category such as medical or accident
target.comment: R4B `Coverage.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Coverage.type`
